channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Flash Player
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Flash Player

item.title: CVE-2018-15981|2024-08-05T10:10:05.650Z -- adobe -- flash%20player
item.description: Flash Player versions 31.0.0.148 and earlier have a type confusion vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-15967|2024-08-05T10:10:05.649Z -- adobe -- flash%20player
item.description: Adobe Flash Player versions 30.0.0.154 and earlier have a privilege escalation vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to information disclosure.
